451160.name: Rock 'N' Roll Defense: Soundtrack
451160.description:
The Rock 'N' Roll Defense Soundtrack is a collection of 10 tracks from 7 great artists going from punk rock to progressive metal!

All tracks are on MP3 format


Atomic Opera - For Madmen Only
Atomic Opera - Feverdream No. 1
Breaker - Tenfold True
Electric Frankenstein - Face at the Edge of the Crowd
Ghost of Maine - Aphasia
Ghost of Maine - The Healer
Jackalopes - Kentucky Applejack
Jackalopes - Those great big... (memories)
Leda Atomica - Heartbeat
sHIT for bRAINS - Sleep No More
451160.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
